nodes.name: help.getConfig
nodes.description: Returns current configuration, including data center configuration.

nodes.name: help.getNearestDc
nodes.description: Returns info on data centre nearest to the user.

nodes.name: help.getAppUpdate
nodes.description: Returns information on update availability for the current application.

nodes.name: help.getInviteText
nodes.description: Returns localized text of a text message with an invitation.

nodes.name: help.getSupport
nodes.description: Returns the support user for the 'ask a question' feature.

nodes.name: help.getAppChangelog
nodes.description:
Get changelog of current app.
Typically, an updates constructor will be returned, containing one or more updateServiceNotification updates with app-specific changelogs.

nodes.name: help.setBotUpdatesStatus
nodes.description: Informs the server about the number of pending bot updates if they haven't been processed for a long time; for bots only

nodes.name: help.getCdnConfig
nodes.description: Get configuration for CDN file downloads.

nodes.name: help.getRecentMeUrls
nodes.description: Get recently used t.me links

nodes.name: help.getTermsOfServiceUpdate
nodes.description: Look for updates of telegram's terms of service

nodes.name: help.acceptTermsOfService
nodes.description: Accept the new terms of service

nodes.name: help.getDeepLinkInfo
nodes.description: Get info about a t.me link

nodes.name: help.getAppConfig
nodes.description: Get app-specific configuration, see client configuration for more info on the result.

nodes.name: help.saveAppLog
nodes.description: Saves logs of application on the server.

nodes.name: help.getPassportConfig
nodes.description: Get passport configuration

nodes.name: help.getSupportName
nodes.description: Get localized name of the telegram support user

nodes.name: help.getUserInfo
nodes.description: Internal use

nodes.name: help.editUserInfo
nodes.description: Internal use

nodes.name: help.getPromoData
nodes.description: Get MTProxy/Public Service Announcement information

nodes.name: help.hidePromoData
nodes.description: Hide MTProxy/Public Service Announcement information

nodes.name: help.dismissSuggestion
nodes.description: Dismiss a suggestion

nodes.name: help.getCountriesList
nodes.description: Get name, ISO code, localized name and phone codes/patterns of all available countries
